scripts.start: npm run run-build && npm run preview
scripts.start-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw && npm run preview
scripts.start-claims: npm run run-build-claims && npm run preview
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw-claims && npm run preview
scripts.start-sw: npm run run-build-sw && npm run preview
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw && npm run preview
scripts.start-sw-claims: npm run run-build-sw-claims && npm run preview
scripts.start-sw-claims-reloadsw: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims && npm run preview
scripts.run-build: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --RELOAD_SW=true
scripts.run-build-claims: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --CLAIMS=true
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims: routify -b && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --CLAIMS=true --RELOAD_SW=true
scripts.run-build-sw: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --SW=true
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --RELOAD_SW=true --SW=true
scripts.run-build-sw-claims: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --CLAIMS=true --SW=true
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims: rimraf .svelte-kit && rimraf build && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true svelte-kit build && node ./pwa.js --BASE_URL=/ --SOURCE_MAP=true --CLAIMS=true --RELOAD_SW=true --SW=true
